Asụsụ Makwe ma ọ bụ Macue (Kimakwe), bụ ezigbo onye ikwu Swahili a na-asụ n'ụsọ osimiri nke Cabo Delgado Province nke Mozambique, na n'ofe oke na mpaghara Mtwara nke Tanzania
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere myiri dị elu (60%) na Swahili, ọ bụghị ya na nwa nwanne nna ya bụ Mwani
atụ aro na ọ nwere ike bụrụ asụsụ agwakọtara Makonde-Swahili.
